name: Amok
text: {1}, Discard a card at random: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

editions.flavor: Crovax's rage was horrifying. Within moments only blood and shreds of flesh remained of the shapeshifter.

name: Awakening
text: At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all creatures and lands.

editions.flavor:
"There are times when destiny calls forth a people and demands an action. Now is the time. We are the people. This is our action. Charge!"
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Bandage
text:
Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
Draw a card.

editions.flavor: Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.
Takara shook with guilt. She knew the last image her father had seen was her sword flashing toward him.

editions.flavor:

editions.flavor:

editions.flavor:
"As it moved, the wurm's spines gathered up bits of flowstone, which took the shapes of dead villagers' heads. Each head spoke a single sound, but if taken together, they said, ‘Alas for the living.'"
—Dal myth of the wurm

"I wouldn't stand in front of that wurm, son. 'Course, I wouldn't stand behind it neither. In fact, standing anywhere near that wurm's not much of a plan. Running, now that's a plan"
—Wandering mage

"They're as much like plants as animals. Leave them unchecked, and they'll choke out all other forms of life."
—Hadi Kasten, Calla Dale naturalist
